channel.title: [613/614] Microfire [The future of online gaming]
channel.description:
[i]Hey, Welcome to Microfire Development page![/i] [b]So. At the moment we only have 2 developers, Myself & Connor..
revengescape: 614 base: rs2hd
The server currently has:
100% ancient curses player vs player combat modern teleports item bonuses Character saving
Were looking for experienced coders that can help develop Microfire so we can make a revolution in RuneScape. Dont apply if you can't code & want to learn. Our past server has been extremely sucsessful but we had to shut it down due to lack of players.. We had a total of 630+ Downloads. We do have a web-developer that is talented with XHTML & CSS..[/b] [font=arial][size=24pt]OUR GOALS[/size][/font] A stable anti null server, Punishments Npc Combat, XP Training, Working friends list, Character saving (.XML) A good economy, Shops (from interface?) A donator rank with rights Media [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/20ij6hi.png[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/aczndv.png[/img]
Real Name: Age: Way of contact (msn): Email Adress: What you have to offer: Experiance:
We advise that you stick to the application format. Thanks, Makka & Connor.

item.title: [613/614] Microfire [The future of online gaming]
item.dc:creator: @Nasz Nasz
item.description:
@Nasz wrote:

Kaii let’s get started aye?

1.) You can’t code.

2.) How to you have 630+ downloads but lack of players…

3.) Your web developer isn’t really experienced with XHTML, or CSS, more like using a free forum hoster like forumotion and downloading themes and applying them… =.=". And your 562 loading 602 webclient can be found in a tutorial from laurent… fp

EDIT Soz forgot to mention. gl.

Hey, Welcome to Microfire Development page!

[b]So. At the moment we only have 2 developers, Myself & Connor…

revengescape: 614 base: rs2hd
The server currently has:
100% ancient curses player vs player combat modern teleports item bonuses Character saving

Were looking for experienced coders that can help develop Microfire so we can make a revolution in RuneScape. Dont apply if you can’t code & want to learn.
Our past server has been extremely sucsessful but we had to shut it down due to lack of players… We had a total of 630+ Downloads. We do have a web-developer that is talented with XHTML & CSS…[/b]
